page.title: 12EDUCATION (continued)
page.content: GREENHOLM Greenholm School was built in 1954. It has 350 pupils and 13 staff altogether.It is an open-site school. It also has 2 play-grounds and it has a kitchen and a canteen. GREAT BARR Great Barr School was opened in 1955. It has 1,785 pupils and 109 staff.The 6th form has around 200 pupils. Facilities include 4 halls,4 gymnasia and sports halls and 11 science laboratories.The school was one of the first comprehensives in Birmingham. BROOKLYN COLLEGE Brooklyn Technical College opened on the 19th of June, 1954.Approximately 5,000 students attend the college-1,500 full-time and 3,500 part-time.The courses offered are mainly Â£O' and Â£A'Levels in subjects such as surveying or shorthand.
